CustomField.description: Though responses are automatically saved, you can set a label here to explicitly show Save Draft button for participants to save responses.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the label to be used for the 'save draft' button in the survey response interface. This button allows participants to explicitly save their responses as a draft, even though responses are automatically saved. Providing this button gives participants the option to save their progress and return to complete the survey at a later time.
CustomField.label: Save Draft Button Label
